sentences: Temple was born in Salem, Massachusetts.
After spending time in Northern California, he studied painting at Boston's Museum of Fine Arts.
After struggling to make a living as a visual artist, including painting murals in upscale New York City apartments, Temple moved into songwriting and recording.
After recording a four song EP himself on a four-track recorder, Temple was signed to Mill Pond Records of Seattle.
Temple also began releasing music under the alias Art Feynman in 2017.
